Directions: In a large skillet, cook potatoes and onion in butter until tender and lightly browned. In a bowl, beat eggs, milk, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper. Pour over potato mixture. Sprinkle with pepperoni. Cover and cook on medium-low heat for 10-12 minutes or until eggs are set. Remove from the heat. Sprinkle with cheese; cover and let stand for 2 minutes. Cut into wedges.
Ingredients: 2 1/2 cups frozen shredded hash brown potatoes
